an5.17:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu attahitaya patipanno hoti, no parahitaya.
an5.17:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attana silasampanno hoti, no param silasampadaya samadapeti;
an5.17:1.4: attana samadhisampanno hoti, no param samadhisampadaya samadapeti;
an5.17:1.5: attana pannasampanno hoti, no param pannasampadaya samadapeti;
an5.17:1.6: attana vimuttisampanno hoti, no param vimuttisampadaya samadapeti;
an5.17:1.7: attana vimuttinanadassanasampanno hoti, no param vimuttinanadassanasampadaya samadapeti.
an5.17:1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi angehi samannagato bhikkhu attahitaya patipanno hoti, no parahitaya”ti.
